title: TCT Clip: Malcolm Guite on Tolkien's insight
description:
Poet Malcolm Guite talks about J.R.R. Tolkien's dramatic insight into the modern tendency to lose the 'whole' for the sake of its constituent parts. Also: Coleridge, T.S. Eliot, and the place of imagination.

Full Conversation:

https://www.thecommontoad.com/post/conversations-malcolm-guite-soul-in-paraphrase-heart-in-pilgrimage
